resources.string: Exchangeable solution. The shells can be turn 90º after wearing so at least 4 times longer lifetime
2,5 times better service lifetime and easy assembling and disassembling of wear protection plates
Increasing lifetime, from 730 days with previous solution to 1095 days with current solution
Reducing welding time (around 65%) . Increasing life time up to 3 times
Increasing lifetime more that 5 times compared to Hardox
Faster application with this wire and absence of slag
Longer life time, less risks of cracking (hydrogen cracks or residual stress in the HAZ)
Good weldabilty, excellent mechanical properties and high deposition rate
Longer service life and higher equipment efficiency. Cavitec has the best comparison results to any other alloy.
Longer service lifetime, at least 3 years
Life time increased up to 4 times
Increasing service lifetime. Very long, not finish yet.
Service lifetime : 4-5 months and quicker repair

It is usual that an observed worn part involves the combination of several individual wear mechanisms. Simple solutions become insuficient and the practical solution lies with experience,a broad product range and partnership.

 THIS IS A TRUE CASTOLIN EUTECTIC COMPETENCE

 This makes the wear mechanism considerably more complex and difficult to understand. Sometimes 2, 3 or even 4 different wear mechanisms can be operating, which render the simple solutions insufficient. However, the primary wear mechanism must be established.

 1. Analyse and identify the primary wear factor involved
 2. Analyse and identify the secondary and tertiary wear factors
 3. Use this guide to have a first selection of the Endotec wires oriented to your application requirements.

 If needed consult your technical department for confirmation and further help in welding procedure
